definition: to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音机能收听到伦敦的电台吗？

sentences.english: By 1958, new models of transistor radios from Sony sold widely throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 到1958年，索尼新型晶体管收音机销遍全世界。

sentences.english: This is a clock radio with alarm.
sentences.chinese: 这是个带闹钟功能的钟控收音机。

sentences.english: A: Sorry. I broke your radio.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我把你的收音机弄坏了。

sentences.english: In his new home I noticed a sewing-machine and a radio.
sentences.chinese: 在他的新居中，我看到一架缝纫机和一台收音机。

sentences.english: With the radio on, grandma slept deeply in the chair .
sentences.chinese: 无线电收音机开者，祖母在椅子里沉沉的入睡。

sentences.english: The radio's dial twirled and the lights behind the tuning panel went out.
sentences.chinese: 收音机的调谐钮转动了一下，面板上的指示灯熄灭了。

sentences.english: You get up in the morning and put on your glasses, snap on the radio, and grab the morning paper.
sentences.chinese: 你在早上醒来，戴上眼镜，打开收音机，拿起早报。

sentences.english: Turn down the radio please, it's too noisy.
sentences.chinese: 把收音机音量关小点，太吵啦。

sentences.english: The radios made in Shanghai are as good asthose(=the radios)made in Tianjing.
sentences.chinese: 上海生产的收音机和天津生产的一样好。

sentences.english: Unintentionally Zhang Jie from the radio to hear that the first "after tomorrow."
sentences.chinese: 无意间从收音机里听到张杰的那首《明天过后》。

sentences.english: Turn on the radio in the car or your home, there they are.
sentences.chinese: 在你的车里或家里，打开收音机，他们在那。

sentences.english: Could you turn down the car radio?
sentences.chinese: 你可以把车里的收音机音量关小点吗？

sentences.english: Often when one listens to a symphonic concert on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 当一个人从收音机中听交响音乐会时。

sentences.english: When I get up in the morning, I turn on the radio or CCTV-9 first.
sentences.chinese: 早晨醒来，我打开收音机或者是中央9台。

sentences.english: Slightly larger units can run radios and black-and-white television sets.
sentences.chinese: 稍许大一点的装置能带收音机和黑白电视机。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
